Update.name: UGX Script Placer 2.0.1.exe
Update.Description: - Corrected easyFX + UGX-MOD 400FX crash - Added worldspawn settings to setup map - Added Auto check for custom items added to IWD list - Disabled the ability to select any file type in the screens section(caused infinite loop)

Update.name: UGX Script Placer v1.0.0.7.zip
Update.Description: - Added text change to generate button - Added UGX Modtools Patch support - Made FX count improvements - Loadout GSC file optimized

Update.name: UGX Script Placer v1.0.0.6.exe
Update.Description: - Fixed menu bug with main menu checkbox - Added recomended text updates - Fixed offline main thread stall due to auto updater - Added .ZIP support to auto updater

Update.name: UGX Script Placer v1.0.0.4.exe
Update.Description: - Created simplistic mode - Vision options are now functional - Added todo list under Help>About to show what is functional and what is not - Included UGX Easy FX

Update.name: UGX Script Placer v1.0.0.3.exe
Update.Description: - custom weather FX isn't required to be inside the user's raw/fx - Included log file support - Added console disable option for both stock and UGX-MOD - Modified overwrite screen for less clutter

Update.name: UGX Script Placer v1.0.0.2.exe
Update.Description: - Added hash checksum for downloaded mod resource
